org.deeplearning4j.rbm

Class RBMOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.optimize.NeuralNetworkOptimizer
      • org.deeplearning4j.rbm.RBMOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cc.mallet.optimize.Optimizable, cc.mallet.optimize.Optimizable.ByGradientValue, java.io.Serializable, NeuralNetEpochListener, OptimizableByGradientValueMatrix

    public class RBMOptimizer
extends NeuralNetworkOptimizer
    Optimizes an RBM. Handles dissemination of a parameter vector via the weights, hidden bias, and visible bias
    See Also:
